bibl.title: The Oxyrhynchus Historian and the Origins of the Corinthian War.
bibl.note: The purpose of this paper is to defend the Oxyrhynchus Historian's thesis (2.2; 13.1) persuasively, by identifying the Spartan interference in Boeotioan internal affairs and showing how that interference led to war.
Lendon J.E., The Oxyrhynchus Historian and the Origins of the Corinthian War.
